NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 26751? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Pipeline}'s peak at {37588},{Air Cargo}'s peak at {41692},{Courier Services}'s peak at {40791}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 29557? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Rail Freight or Barge?
NC.A: {Barge} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Cargo Truck or Container Ship?
NC.A: {Cargo Truck} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {4} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Container Ship}
